sentences.sContent: Small branch of the bronchus that carries air to and from the alveoli.
sentences.sContent_eng: Small branch of the bronchus that carries air to and from the alveoli.
sentences.sCn: 细支气管-- 支气管的细小分支，输送空气进出肺泡。

sentences.sContent: With contaminated hand, turn the child's head to right side to suction left bronchus.
sentences.sContent_eng: With contaminated hand, turn the child's head to right side to suction left bronchus.
sentences.sCn: 用已污染的手将小儿的头部转向右侧以吸引左侧支气管。

sentences.sContent: It is used tablet and injection etc and curing cancer leucopenia disease chronic tracheitis of bronchus asthma and panting mould bacillary dysentery and enteritis etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is used tablet and injection etc and curing cancer leucopenia disease chronic tracheitis of bronchus asthma and panting mould bacillary dysentery and enteritis etc.
sentences.sCn: 用于片剂、针剂等。治疗癌症、白细胞减少症、支气管哮喘和喘息型慢性气管炎、细菌性痢疾及肠炎等。

words.tran: [内科][药] 支气管扩张剂；支气管扩张器

trans.tranOther: either of the two main branches of the trachea, which contain cartilage within their walls
